Weight_In_Grams.description: The base unit for weight, representing the weight of the item in grams.

Color_Code.description: A string representing the color code of the item.

Useage_State.description: A value representing the usage state of the item.

Matter_State.description: A value representing the state of matter of the item.

Length_In_Meters.description: The base unit for length, representing the length of the item in meters.

Volume_In_Liters.description: The base unit for volume, representing the volume of the item in liters.

Temperature_In_Celsius.description: The base unit for temperature, representing the temperature of the item in degrees Celsius.

Time_In_Seconds.description: The base unit for time, representing the time of the item in seconds.

Speed_In_Meters_Per_Second.description: The base unit for speed, representing the speed of the item in meters per second.

Area_In_Square_Meters.description: The base unit for area, representing the area of the item in square meters.

Pressure_In_Pascals.description: The base unit for pressure, representing the pressure of the item in pascals.

Energy_In_Joules.description: The base unit for energy, representing the energy of the item in joules.

Density_In_Grams_Per_Cubic_Centimeter.description: The base unit for density, representing the density of the item in grams per cubic centimeter.

Volume_In_Cubic_Meters.description: The base unit for volume, representing the volume of the item in cubic meters.

Heat_Capacity_In_Joules_Per_Kelvin.description: The base unit for heat capacity, representing the heat capacity of the item in joules per kelvin.
